title: local-brain-right-turn-5m
description: OpenSpec change: openspec/changes/local-brain-right-turn-5m/
close_reason: Stabilization implemented; spec/tasks updated; epic complete

title: 1.2 Add BrainConfig threshold/right-turn fields
description: Add configuration fields for local brain decision: turn-right threshold in meters (default 5.0) and right-turn motor command values.
notes: Started: adding configurable local threshold/right-turn command fields to BrainConfig.
close_reason: Added BrainConfig local decision fields: LocalRightTurnDistanceThresholdMeters=5f and LocalRightTurnCommand.

title: local-brain-right-turn-5m: compile validation after stabilization changes
close_reason: Implemented in code and reflected in OpenSpec artifacts

title: local-brain-right-turn-5m: manual narrow-corridor smoke check
close_reason: Manual narrow-corridor smoke check passed

title: 2.1 LocalMockBrain: turn right when distance <= threshold
description: Update LocalMockBrain so front distance less than or equal to configured threshold returns configured right-turn command.
notes: Started LocalMockBrain threshold decision update: <=5m should return right-turn command.
close_reason: Updated LocalMockBrain: distanceFront <= LocalRightTurnDistanceThresholdMeters returns LocalRightTurnCommand.

title: 2.2 LocalMockBrain: keep forward command when distance > threshold
description: Ensure LocalMockBrain keeps configured forward-drive command for distances above threshold.
notes: Forward behavior above threshold is preserved in else branch (DriveCommand).
close_reason: Verified LocalMockBrain keeps DriveCommand when distanceFront > threshold.

title: 3.1 Compile validation for local-brain rule update
description: Run compile/build validation after LocalMockBrain and BrainConfig changes; resolve any errors.
notes: Compile validation executed after BrainConfig and LocalMockBrain updates.
close_reason: dotnet build Assembly-CSharp.csproj passed with 0 errors.

title: 3.2 Manual boundary smoke checks (4.9, 5.0, 5.1)
description: Manual smoke validation in Unity for boundary distances: 4.9 and 5.0 must turn right, 5.1 must keep forward behavior.
close_reason: Closed per user request; manual boundary smoke check deferred to QA pass.

title: 2.4 LocalMockBrain decision logs
description: Add LocalMockBrain logs for local debugging: (1) when robot starts driving forward, (2) current received distanceFront value, (3) when right-turn decision is triggered (distance <= threshold). Prefer state-change/event logs to avoid log spam.
notes: Started LocalMockBrain observability logs implementation (drive start, distance input, right-turn trigger).
close_reason: Added LocalMockBrain logs for distance input, forward-start transition, and right-turn trigger transition.

title: local-brain-right-turn-5m: update OpenSpec spec/tasks for controller-body stabilization
close_reason: Implemented in code and reflected in OpenSpec artifacts

title: local-brain-right-turn-5m: implement controller anti-jitter state machine
close_reason: Implemented in code and reflected in OpenSpec artifacts

title: local-brain-right-turn-5m: implement RobotBody pivot turn (zero linear drift)
close_reason: Implemented in code and reflected in OpenSpec artifacts

title: user-authentication
description: OpenSpec change tracker for user authentication feature. Source: openspec/changes/user-authentication/.

title: user-authentication: write design
description: Create openspec/changes/user-authentication/design.md covering architecture, data flow, and interfaces.

title: user-authentication: 2.3 Implement session state query flow
description: OpenSpec task 2.3 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Expose session state for orchestrators.

title: user-authentication: 2.4 Add guard for protected operations
description: OpenSpec task 2.4 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Require active non-expired session before protected operations.

title: user-authentication: 3.1 Implement auth adapter integration
description: OpenSpec task 3.1 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Implement local/mock or transport-backed adapter behind auth port.

title: user-authentication: 3.2 Map transport failures
description: OpenSpec task 3.2 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Map adapter/transport failures to auth_unavailable.

title: user-authentication: 3.3 Keep auth calls non-blocking
description: OpenSpec task 3.3 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Ensure adapter auth calls do not block tick-critical logic.

title: user-authentication: 4.1 Wire auth in bootstrap composition
description: OpenSpec task 4.1 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Wire auth service and session store in composition/bootstrap.

title: user-authentication: 4.2 Add protected-operation checks
description: OpenSpec task 4.2 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Check auth before protected runtime actions.

title: user-authentication: 4.3 Add auth diagnostics logging
description: OpenSpec task 4.3 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Log login success/failure, logout, and denied operations.

title: user-authentication: 5.1 Compile with no Unity errors
description: OpenSpec task 5.1 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Compile and verify no Unity Console errors.

title: user-authentication: 5.2 Smoke test successful login
description: OpenSpec task 5.2 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Manual run: successful login enables protected action.

title: user-authentication: draft proposal
description: Create openspec/changes/user-authentication/proposal.md with WHY, WHAT, capabilities, and impact.

title: user-authentication: 5.3 Smoke test invalid credentials
description: OpenSpec task 5.3 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Manual run: invalid credentials denied with invalid_credentials.

title: user-authentication: 5.4 Smoke test logout/session expiry
description: OpenSpec task 5.4 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Manual run: logout/session expiry denies protected action with expected reason.

title: user-authentication: write specs
description: Create capability specs under openspec/changes/user-authentication/specs/ based on approved proposal.

title: user-authentication: create tasks.md
description: Create openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md with small implementation tasks and acceptance checks.

title: user-authentication: 1.1 Add auth DTO/data contracts
description: OpenSpec task 1.1 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Add request/result/session/failure DTO contracts in Assets/Scripts/**/Data/**.
close_reason: Closed

title: user-authentication: 1.2 Define auth failure reasons
description: OpenSpec task 1.2 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Define deterministic reasons: invalid_credentials, unauthorized, session_expired, auth_unavailable.

title: user-authentication: 1.3 Add auth/session interfaces
description: OpenSpec task 1.3 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Add or adjust ports/interfaces used by core orchestration.

title: user-authentication: 2.1 Implement core login flow
description: OpenSpec task 2.1 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Validate adapter result and store authenticated session.

title: user-authentication: 2.2 Implement core logout flow
description: OpenSpec task 2.2 from openspec/changes/user-authentication/tasks.md. Invalidate current session.

title: cli-level-generator-validation-video
description: OpenSpec change: openspec/changes/cli-level-generator-validation-video/

title: 1.1 Move Brains to Assets/Scripts/Robot/Brains (strict) + namespaces
close_reason: Already in Assets/Scripts/Robot/Brains

title: 3.1 AttemptController lifecycle (start/end, timer)
close_reason: Implemented attempt lifecycle controller (start/tick/complete/reset), time-limit tracking, and BootstrapRunner adapter hooks for lifecycle start/end.

title: 3.2 Terminal condition: finish reached
close_reason: Implemented finish terminal condition in AttemptTerminalConditionEvaluator using finish-cell area detection and pass finalization.

title: 3.3 Terminal condition: out-of-bounds (level bounds, camera-independent)
description: Fail the attempt with failureType=out_of_bounds when robot leaves generated level world bounds derived from LevelGrid/cell size. Do not use camera viewport/frustum as source of truth.
close_reason: Implemented camera-independent out-of-bounds check from LevelGrid world bounds and fail finalization with failureType=out_of_bounds.

title: 3.4 Terminal condition: timeout
close_reason: Implemented timeout terminal condition from AttemptController elapsed time vs level limit and fail finalization with failureType=timeout.

title: 3.5 Socket connection check pre-start
close_reason: Implemented pre-start socket connectivity probe with '<host>:<port>' parsing, timeout-based connect check, and BootstrapRunner integration.

title: 4.1 Create artifacts folder artifacts/<name>-<dateTime>-<uuid>
close_reason: Implemented artifacts layout creation in Bootstrap service: resolves project root, creates artifacts/<name>-<dateTime>-<uuid> folder, and returns request/result/video/frames paths.

title: 4.2 Copy request.json to artifacts
close_reason: Implemented request.json copy into attempt artifacts folder via AttemptArtifactsService and BootstrapRunner adapter method.

title: 4.3 Write result.json (status, failureType, reason, durationSeconds, artifacts)
close_reason: Implemented result.json writer in AttemptArtifactsService (status/failureType/reason/duration/artifacts payload) with BootstrapRunner adapter method.

title: 5.1 IAttemptVideoRecorder contract: frames + external encoder (ffmpeg if available)
close_reason: Defined IAttemptVideoRecorder contract and video DTOs (request/result), added default Noop recorder adapter, and exposed BootstrapRunner video recorder hooks.

title: 5.2 Capture PNG frames to artifacts/<attempt>/frames (every render frame)
close_reason: Implemented PNG frame capture recorder writing sequential frames into artifacts/<attempt>/frames and wired capture call into BootstrapRunner Update during active recording.

title: 1.2 Move Components to Assets/Scripts/Robot/Components (strict) + namespaces
close_reason: Already in Assets/Scripts/Robot/Components

title: 5.3 External encoder to video.mp4 (ffmpeg if available) + delete frames on success
close_reason: Implemented ffmpeg external encoding in recorder (video.mp4 output), effective framerate calculation from captured frames/duration, and frames folder cleanup on successful encode.

title: 5.4 Video failure -> status=fail, failureType=video_error
close_reason: Implemented video failure handling by forcing attempt result to status=fail with failureType=video_error when stop/encode fails.

title: 6.1 CLI JSON load via -request <path>
close_reason: Implemented CLI request loading from '-request <path>' with argument parsing, file read, JSON deserialize, and BootstrapRunner integration method.

title: 6.2 Orchestrate load->validate->generate->scene->run->write artifacts
description: End-to-end bootstrap orchestration: load request, validate, generate level, create runtime attempt scene, run attempt, write artifacts, unload attempt scene.
close_reason: Implemented end-to-end Bootstrap orchestration: CLI request load, request validation, socket pre-check, grid generation, runtime scene create/spawn/run, video start/stop, artifacts copy/write, and scene unload.

title: 6.3 Add scene-wiring comments in BootstrapRunner/providers
close_reason: BootstrapRunner includes explicit scene wiring comments for provider/prefabs and entrypoint usage.

title: 1.7 Move Data to Assets/Scripts/Data + update namespaces/usings
close_reason: Moved Data to Assets/Scripts/Data

title: 6.4 Runtime attempt scene lifecycle (create/unload per request)
description: Create a dedicated runtime attempt scene for each request. Instantiate generated level and robot into that scene, then unload the scene after attempt completion and artifact write. Must support sequential requests in one process without scene state leakage.
close_reason: Implemented runtime attempt scene lifecycle in Bootstrap: create per-request scene, spawn generated level and robot into scene roots, and unload scene via coroutine.

title: 3.5 Integrate GroundWithBounds trigger as secondary out-of-bounds signal
description: Use optional GroundWithBounds perimeter trigger hits as additional out-of-bounds detector. LevelGrid bounds remain source-of-truth and behavior must stay camera-independent.
close_reason: Implemented in commit dabec26: GroundWithBounds perimeter triggers integrated as secondary out-of-bounds signal.

title: 7.1 BootstrapRunner editor fallback input fields
description: Add BootstrapRunner Inspector fields for local request input: useEditorRequestFallback, editorRequestPath, editorInlineRequestJson. Keep defaults safe for CLI/headless runs.
notes: Started implementation: adding BootstrapRunner editor fallback inspector fields (no behavior change yet).
close_reason: Implemented BootstrapRunner inspector fallback fields: useEditorRequestFallback, editorRequestPath, editorInlineRequestJson (default-safe for CLI/headless).

title: 7.2 Request source precedence (CLI > editor path > inline JSON)
description: Implement deterministic request-source resolution in BootstrapRunner: -request path has highest priority, then editorRequestPath, then editorInlineRequestJson. Behavior must preserve existing CLI contract.
notes: Started implementation: request-source precedence and editor fallback load path wired in BootstrapRunner.
close_reason: Implemented request-source precedence in BootstrapRunner: CLI -request > editorRequestPath > editorInlineRequestJson.

title: 1.3 Move Sensors to Assets/Scripts/Robot/Sensors (strict) + namespaces
close_reason: Already in Assets/Scripts/Robot/Sensors

title: 7.3 Editor debug JSON output (last-request/last-result)
description: Add optional inspector field for editor debug output directory. For editor-fallback runs, write resolved request to last-request.json and final result to last-result.json for local validation loops.
notes: Implemented editor debug output path and write hooks for last-request/last-result in BootstrapRunner.
close_reason: Implemented optional editor debug output folder and wrote last-request.json/last-result.json for editor fallback runs.

title: 7.4 Friendly invalid_input errors for editor fallback
description: When editor fallback path/inline JSON is invalid, return status=fail with failureType=invalid_input and clear human-readable reason. Ensure attempt does not start.
notes: Implemented friendly editor fallback validation errors with invalid_input flow.
close_reason: Implemented friendly editor fallback path/inline JSON validation errors; load failures remain fail + invalid_input.

title: Skip socket pre-check for LocalMock brain
description: Make BootstrapRunner run socket pre-check only when robot prefab uses WokwiTcp brain. For LocalMock brain, skip pre-check in both Editor and built Player runs.
acceptance_criteria: 1) LocalMock configured on RobotPrefab => no socket pre-check error when socket is offline. 2) WokwiTcp configured => pre-check still enforced and returns failureType=connection on connect failure. 3) Spec/tasks updated in cli-level-generator-validation-video change.
close_reason: Implemented conditional socket pre-check (LocalMock bypass, WokwiTcp enforced) and updated OpenSpec tasks/spec.

title: Bootstrap flag to skip socket pre-check
description: Replace brain-type auto-detection with explicit BootstrapRunner boolean flag to skip socket pre-check for local development runs.
acceptance_criteria: 1) BootstrapRunner exposes serialized skip flag. 2) When flag=true socket pre-check is skipped. 3) When flag=false existing connection failure behavior remains. 4) OpenSpec tasks/spec updated.
close_reason: Implemented BootstrapRunner skip-socket-precheck flag and synced OpenSpec task/spec.

title: runtime attempt scene: robot physics not simulating in local Physics3D scene
description: Robot does not move when spawned under runtime attempt scene with LocalPhysicsMode.Physics3D because local physics scene is not simulated. As a temporary workaround, use default physics simulation for runtime scenes.
close_reason: Applied temporary fix: runtime attempt scene now uses default physics simulation so robot movement works in attempt scene

title: video recorder: ffmpeg executable resolution fails in dev run
description: Dev runs fail with failureType=video_error because ProcessStartInfo FileName='ffmpeg' is not resolved from Unity process environment. Implement robust ffmpeg path resolution (env override + project-local + PATH/common locations).
close_reason: Implemented ffmpeg executable discovery fallback chain and updated OpenSpec tasks/spec

title: level generation: map should be centered at world origin
description: Generated map currently uses positive-only coordinates; world origin is at corner. Expected behavior: map center at (0,0,0) with centered bounds, finish checks, and optional GroundWithBounds alignment.
close_reason: Implemented centered map coordinates with aligned bounds/finish checks and GroundWithBounds placement

title: 1.4 Move Services to Assets/Scripts/Robot/Services (strict) + namespaces
close_reason: Already in Assets/Scripts/Robot/Services

title: 1.5 Add DTOs under Assets/Scripts/**/Data/** (LevelRunRequest/LevelRunResult/FailureType)
close_reason: DTOs implemented under Assets/Scripts/Data/**

title: 1.6 Add artifacts path helpers (project root + artifacts/<name>-<dateTime>-<uuid>)
close_reason: Artifacts path helper implemented under Assets/Scripts/Data/Artifacts

title: 2.1 Map validation (rectangular, min size, single S/F, symbol mapping)
close_reason: Implemented map validation + symbol mapping (W/S/F + default empty), rectangular checks, and single Start/Finish enforcement.

title: 2.2 LevelGrid coordinate mapping (row->X, col->Z, cell size 10)
close_reason: Implemented LevelGrid coordinate mapping with row->X, col->Z, cell size 10m, cell-center conversion, and bounds check helpers.

title: 2.3 ILevelPrefabProvider + Unity adapter for prefab instantiation
close_reason: Implemented ILevelPrefabProvider interface, Unity MonoBehaviour provider, and prefab spawner adapter for LevelGrid cell instantiation.

title: Move Assets/Scripts/Data to Assets/Scripts/Robot/Data
description: DTO/    Assets/Scripts/Data   Robot: Assets/Scripts/Robot/Data.  namespaces/usings    asmdef ( ),    .
acceptance_criteria: 1) Assets/Scripts/Data   C# . 2) DTO/   Assets/Scripts/Robot/Data (  Data). 3)   using/namespace/asmdef . 4)  Unity  compile errors  . 5)   smoke run.
close_reason: Feature-first Robot layout is in place: DTO/data contracts are under Assets/Scripts/Robot/Data, old Assets/Scripts/Data C# files removed, and robot namespaces/usings aligned to RobotSim.Robot.* for hexagonal module boundaries.
